short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Doraemon wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Doraemon background. Doraemon wallpaper background theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features Extension:

1. Each time you open a new tab, enjoy a fresh Doraemon wallpaper with a shuffle feature.
2. Customize your Doraemon background by either randomizing it or marking your favorites in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Conveniently search the web using Google directly from the toolbar.
4. Instantly access your email and social media accounts for seamless connectivity.
5. Stay updated with the current date and time, automatically displayed.
6. Utilize the new Note feature to jot down your tasks and reminders.
7. Easily reach your frequently visited websites with quick links.
8. Access your bookmarked pages effortlessly.
9. Personalize your browsing experience by adding websites to the Shortcut panel for swift access.
10. Instantly launch Google apps with just a click.
11. Explore a variety of themes quickly with the More Themes option.
12. Share your browsing experience seamlessly on social media platforms.
13. Quickly download wallpapers with one click.
14. Dive into gaming without delay with quick access to play games.
15. Enhance your Doraemon new tab experience with fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks.
